title: Initial oneLINK stablecoin parameters
body:
We have learned a lot in the first 12 days of ichi.farm.  Based on those learnings we make the following two recommendations for the initial parameters of oneLINK:

1.	oneLINK minting fee to be set at 0.2% when minting with USDC and 0% when minting with oneBTC.  This will encourage the use of oneBTC to mint oneLINK, drive greater over-collateralization of oneBTC, and reduce the dependency on USDC.
2.	oneLINK minting ratio adjust in 0.2% increments instead of 0.1% increments.  Our minting ratios have only gone as low as 96%, not reaching the minimum ratio default of 90%.  A 0.2% increment will allow the excess reserves to collect more LINK if the stablecoin trades at $1 or higher.
3.	Use LINK excess reserves to purchase oneLINK and deposit to the oneLINK-LINK liquidity pool. This will allow the LINK excess reserves fund to accumulate yields in the form of trading fees and ICHI.  This will further collateralize oneLINK and support oneLINK-LINK liquidity.

Voting options:

Yes to 1, 2, and 3
No to 1
No to 2
No to 3

If the ‘yes to 1, 2, and 3’ doesn’t get a majority vote, we will remove the least popular option and vote again until we get an option with a majority vote.
author: 0x11111D16485aa71D2f2BfFBD294DCACbaE79c1d4
